original_title: MR's Security Chief Arrested By Bribery Commission
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Neville Wanniarachchi, the Chief Security Officer of ex-President Mahinda Rajapaksa, has been taken into custody by the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC).
According to official sources, Wanniarachchi was arrested for failing to cooperate with an ongoing investigation conducted by the Bribery Commission.
